thread.title: Free Online Pamphlet Maker Is Available for Attractive E-Brochure Design
thread.title_full: Free Online Pamphlet Maker Is Available for Attractive E-Brochure Design - CBS News 8 - San Diego, CA News Station - KFMB Channel 8

author: cbs8
title: Free Online Pamphlet Maker Is Available for Attractive E-Brochure Design
text:
If information is power, by adding stunning visual effects with the Free Online Pamphlet Maker, by FlipHTML5, publishers of all sorts can now give a precious boost to the impact of their messages
Hong Kong, China -- ( ReleaseWire ) -- 10/13/2015 -- The challenge of conveying messages in a powerful way has just become more accessible: FlipHTML5 now allows online publishers, in any and every domain, to simply, quickly and freely publish stunning online pamphlets and brochures through its free Online Pamphlet Maker .
The 'online publishing cavalry' support does not end there, though. The team at FlipHTML5 is also sharing with users several key design tips that help them produce very effective informational pieces out of this very useful tool.
Giving some examples of these tips, Anna Lee, Designer of FlipHTML5, highlights that "Publishers should put readers first and show them what they expect to find, making sure that they deliver a good first impression of their field of service, whatever it is, and of how they approach it. Also, it is very important that there is a consistency and reasonable limit to the fonts used, so to unify the style and make it more elegant and easy to follow. A good pamphlet design is clear, simple and visually pleasurable, containing at least one good photo."
These are some of the key guiding principles to producing a beautiful and effective online pamphlet, as FlipHTML5 allows users to do at its free Online Pamphlet Maker: http://fliphtml5.com/online-pamphlets-maker.php
In the words of Anna Lee, "At FlipHTML5, we are strongly committed to offering top-quality, easy to use and widely accessible digital publishing solutions to online publishers in so many different fields, and, through our Online Pamphlet Maker, we are offering one more tool so that publishers from all over the world find in us a strategic ally that supports the work they develop."
About FlipHTML5 Software Co.
FlipHTML5 Software Co. is headed in Hong Kong but offers its advanced and accessible software and technology to users all over the world.
For more information, visit http://fliphtml5.com/
For more information on this press release visit: http://www.releasewire.com/press-releases/free-online-pamphlet-maker-is-available-for-attractive-e-brochure-design-632683.htm
 Lailie Tan
 Lailie Tan
Web: http://fliphtml5.com/
